title: Capstone sprint: one collection end-to-end
content:
Capstone sprint: one collection end-to-end

Run a full GEO sprint on a 10-product collection.

Learning goal

  • Pick one collection (10 products).
  • Apply blueprint + capsule + feed + measurement steps.

Why it matters

  • Prove the process works.
  • Set the foundation to scale.

Explanation

  • Data fix: IDs, price/stock, policy.
  • PDP blueprint + capsule + images.
  • Collection guide + links.
  • Feed check + measurement via prompt set.

Examples

  • Good: every product meets standard, measurement documented.
  • Poor: ad hoc fixes, no measurement.

Guided exercise (10–15 min)

  1. Select the collection, list the 10 products.
  2. Apply blueprint/capsule to all 10.
  3. Run feed/measurement checks.

Independent exercise (5–10 min)

Write a one-page before/after note and next sprint backlog.

Self-check

  • 10 products meet the standard.
  • Measurement run logged.
  • Backlog for next 30 days ready.

Optional deepening

  • Capstone report idea: prompt guide
